title: 2d Metaverse
description: A portal to explore the virtual metaverse, allowing users to interact with immersive 3D environments through browser-based XR experiences. Users can navigate personalized spaces with avatars, initiate face-to-face video calls in real-time, and collaborate inside spatial meeting rooms.
features: Multi-user video conferencing in each space
Modular scene system with reusable components
challenges: Implementing WebRTC-based video calls within avatar interaction
Maintaining real-time interactions across multiple users
Maintaining responsiveness with Tailwind in 3D layout contexts
